trans-unit.source: Represents a data point that is stored in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 表示存储在一个数据点<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCollection"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The DataPoint class stores properties associated with data as well as data point values.
trans-unit.target: DataPoint 类存储属性将与数据以及数据点值。

trans-unit.source: For example, a data point has a value, but it also has a color property, background image property, background gradient property, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 例如，数据点具有一个值，但它也有颜色属性、 背景图像属性、 背景渐变属性等。

trans-unit.source: For more information about data point properties, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties> class overview topic.
trans-unit.target: 点属性的数据有关的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties>类概述主题。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties>

trans-unit.source: Each data point consists of an X-value and one or more Y-values.
trans-unit.target: 每个数据点组成 X 值和一个或多个 Y 值。

trans-unit.source: The X-value can be zero, or you can set this explicitly.
trans-unit.target: X 值可以是零，也可以显式设置。

trans-unit.source: Only one Y-value per point is required for all chart types except bubble, candlestick and stock charts.
trans-unit.target: 每个点的只有一个 Y 值是必需的除气泡、 k 线图和股价图之外的所有图表类型。

trans-unit.source: These chart types require more than one Y-value because one data point consists of multiple values.
trans-unit.target: 这些图表类型需要多个 Y 值，因为一个数据点以多个值组成。

trans-unit.source: For example, to plot one stock chart column, four values are required: high, low, open and close values.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要绘制一个股价图列，四个值是必需的︰ 高、 低、 打开和关闭的值。

trans-unit.source: Data can be added at either design time or run time; you can also use data-binding at run time.
trans-unit.target: 可以在设计时添加数据，或将其运行时间;你还可以在运行时使用数据绑定。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor can be used to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint> class.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此构造函数来创建和初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>类</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>的新实例

trans-unit.source: However, it is highly recommended that you instead add data points at run time, using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.Points%2A> collection property.
trans-unit.target: 但是，强烈建议你改为运行在添加数据点时，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.Points%2A>集合属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.Points%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint"></xref> class, and sets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref> that the data point belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint"></xref>类，并设置<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref>所属的数据点。

trans-unit.source: This constructor can be used to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint> class.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此构造函数来创建和初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>类</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>的新实例

trans-unit.source: However, it is highly recommended that you instead add data points at run time, using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.Points%2A> collection property.
trans-unit.target: 但是，强烈建议你改为运行在添加数据点时，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.Points%2A>集合属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.Points%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref> object that the data point belongs to.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"> </xref>数据点所属的对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint"></xref> class with the specified X and Y-value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint"></xref>类具有指定 X 和 Y 值。

trans-unit.source: This constructor can be used to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint> class.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此构造函数来创建和初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>类</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>的新实例

trans-unit.source: However, it is highly recommended that you instead add data points at run time, using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.Points%2A> collection property.
trans-unit.target: 但是，强烈建议你改为运行在添加数据点时，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.Points%2A>集合属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.Points%2A>

trans-unit.source: The X-value of the data point.
trans-unit.target: 数据点 X 值。

trans-unit.source: The Y-value of the data point.
trans-unit.target: 数据点 Y 值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint"></xref> class with the specified X-value and an array of Y-values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint"></xref>类，该类具有指定 X 值和 Y 值的数组。

trans-unit.source: This constructor can be used to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint> class.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此构造函数来创建和初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>类</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>的新实例

trans-unit.source: However, it is highly recommended that you instead add data points at run time, using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.Points%2A> collection property.
trans-unit.target: 但是，强烈建议你改为运行在添加数据点时，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.Points%2A>集合属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.Points%2A>

trans-unit.source: The X-value.
trans-unit.target: X 值。

trans-unit.source: An array of Y-values.
trans-unit.target: Y 值的数组。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint"></xref> class with the specified X-value and Y-values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint"></xref>类，该类具有指定 X 值和 Y 值。

trans-unit.source: This constructor can be used to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint> class.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此构造函数来创建和初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>类</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>的新实例

trans-unit.source: However, it is highly recommended that you instead add data points at run time, using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.Points%2A> collection property.
trans-unit.target: 但是，强烈建议你改为运行在添加数据点时，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.Points%2A>集合属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.Points%2A>

trans-unit.source: The X-value of the data point.
trans-unit.target: 数据点 X 值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> of Y-values separated by commas.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>的 Y 值用逗号分隔。

trans-unit.source: Returns an exact copy of the data point.
trans-unit.target: 返回的数据点的一个精确副本。

trans-unit.source: Use the Clone method to obtain an exact copy of the data point.
trans-unit.target: 使用克隆方法以获取数据点的一个精确副本。

trans-unit.source: A cloned <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 克隆<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns a data point that is specified by its name.
trans-unit.target: 返回由其名称指定的数据点。

trans-unit.source: This is a helper function.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个帮助器函数。

trans-unit.source: Point value names.
trans-unit.target: 点值名称。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents a data point.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>表示一个数据点的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether a data point is marked as empty.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个标志，指示是否数据点标记为空。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to `true` to mark a data point as an empty point.
trans-unit.target: 将此属性设置为`true`标记为一个空点数据点。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively one of the `InsertEmptyPoints` methods in the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator> class can be used to mark missing data as empty points.
trans-unit.target: 或者之一`InsertEmptyPoints`中的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator>类可以用于将缺少的数据作为空点。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.EmptyPointStyle%2A> property determines how empty points are displayed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.EmptyPointStyle%2A>属性确定如何将空点显示。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.EmptyPointStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the point is marked as an empty point; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果点标记为空点;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the data point.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据点的名称。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the name of the data point.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>值，该值表示数据点的名称。

trans-unit.source: Sets the X-value and one or more Y-values of the data point.
trans-unit.target: 设置 X 值和一个或多个的 Y 值的数据点。

trans-unit.source: Use the SetValueXY method to set the value(s) of a data point at run-time.
trans-unit.target: SetValueXY 方法用于在运行时设置的数据点值。

trans-unit.source: Note that if you set the X-value to a value other than zero (0), a scatter plot will be generated.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，是否为零 (0) 以外的值设置 X 值，则将生成一个散点图。

trans-unit.source: For further details, see the Remarks section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.XValue%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多详细信息，请参阅备注部分的<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.XValue%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.XValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Refer to the following table for a complete listing of valid .NET Framework types that can be used for the object type parameter.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅下表中的有效的.NET Framework 类型可以用于对象的类型参数的完整列表。

trans-unit.source: |||| |-|-|-| |String|DateTime|Double| |Decimal|Single|Int32| |UInt32|Int64|UInt64|
trans-unit.target: |||| |-|-|-| |字符串 |DateTime |Double | |十进制 |单个 |Int32 | |UInt32 |Int64 |UInt64 |

trans-unit.source: The X-value of the data point.
trans-unit.target: 数据点 X 值。

trans-unit.source: A list of Y-values of the data point.
trans-unit.target: 数据点的 Y 值的列表。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Y-value(s) of a single data point.
trans-unit.target: 设置 Y 的值的单个数据点。

trans-unit.source: The SetValueY property is used to set the Y-value(s) of a data point at run time.
trans-unit.target: SetValueY 属性用于设置 Y 的值的数据点在运行时。

trans-unit.source: Only one Y-value per point is required for all chart types except for bubble, candlestick and stock charts.
trans-unit.target: 每个点的只有一个 Y 值是必需的气泡、 k 线图和股价图除外的所有图表类型。

trans-unit.source: These chart types require more than one Y-value because one data point consists of multiple values.
trans-unit.target: 这些图表类型需要多个 Y 值，因为一个数据点以多个值组成。

trans-unit.source: For example, to plot one stock chart column, four values are required: high, low, open and close values.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要绘制一个股价图列，四个值是必需的︰ 高、 低、 打开和关闭的值。

trans-unit.source: This property returns an array of `double` values when used to retrieve multiple Y-values.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回的数组`double`值时用于检索多个 Y 值。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.YValuesPerPoint%2A> property determines the maximum number of Y-values that all data points in a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> can have.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;><xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.YValuesPerPoint%2A>属性确定的最大中所有数据都点的 Y 值数<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>可以具有。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.YValuesPerPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you specify more than the allowable number of Y-values, an exception will be raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定多个 Y 值的允许数，将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: > > Refer to the following table for a complete listing of valid .NET Framework types that can be used for the object type parameter: |||| |-|-|-| |String|DateTime|Double| |Decimal|Single|Int32| |UInt32|Int64|UInt64|
trans-unit.target: >> 参考下表中的有效的.NET Framework 类型可以用于对象的类型参数的完整列表: | | | |-|-|-| |字符串 |DateTime |Double | |十进制 |单个 |Int32 | |UInt32 |Int64 |UInt64 |

trans-unit.source: The Y-value(s) of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint"></xref> object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Y 的值的<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint"></xref>集合中的对象。

trans-unit.source: Formatted as one or more values separated by commas.
trans-unit.target: 格式化为一个或多个用逗号分隔的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the X-value of a data point.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据点的 X 值。

trans-unit.source: All chart types can be displayed as either scatter plots or as non-scatter plots, because both X-values and Y-values can be set.
trans-unit.target: 所有图表类型可以都显示为任一散点图或作为非散点图，因为可以设置 X 值和 Y 值。

trans-unit.source: Setting an X-value will result in a scatter plot, whereas not setting this property—which is equivalent to setting it to zero—will result in a non-scatter plot.
trans-unit.target: 设置 X 值将导致散点图，而不设置此属性，这等同于将它设置为零-将导致在非散点图。

trans-unit.source: For example, to draw a point chart type, add data points that have X-values of zero.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要绘制点图图表类型，添加具有零 X 值的数据点。

trans-unit.source: To display a traditional scatter chart, add data points that have X-values other than zero.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示传统散点图，添加具有非零的 X 值的数据点。

trans-unit.source: The X-values of data points are not required to be set.
trans-unit.target: 不需要设置数据点的 X 值。

trans-unit.source: If they are not set, data points are plotted sequentially, using their index values from the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置这些属性，会绘制数据点按顺序，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCollection>及其索引值

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> that represents the X-value of a data point.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> ，表示数据点的 X 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Y-value(s) of a data point.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 Y 的值的数据点。

trans-unit.source: The YValues property is used to set the Y-values of data points.
trans-unit.target: YValues 属性用于设置数据点的 Y 值。

trans-unit.source: Only one Y-value per point is required for all chart types except bubble, candlestick and stock charts.
trans-unit.target: 每个点的只有一个 Y 值是必需的除气泡、 k 线图和股价图之外的所有图表类型。

trans-unit.source: These chart types require more than one Y-value because one data point consists of multiple values.
trans-unit.target: 这些图表类型需要多个 Y 值，因为一个数据点以多个值组成。

trans-unit.source: For example, to plot one stock chart column, four values are required: high, low, open and close values.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要绘制一个股价图列，四个值是必需的︰ 高、 低、 打开和关闭的值。

trans-unit.source: The YValues property returns an array of `double` values when used to retrieve the Y-values.
trans-unit.target: YValues 属性返回的数组`double`值时用于检索 Y 值。

trans-unit.source: **Important** The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.YValuesPerPoint%2A> property determines the maximum number of Y-values that all data points in a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> can have.
trans-unit.target: **重要**<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.YValuesPerPoint%2A>属性确定的最大中所有数据都点的 Y 值数<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>可以具有。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.YValuesPerPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you specify more than the allowable number of Y-values, an exception will be raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定多个 Y 值的允许数，将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> values that represent the Y-value(s) of a data point.
trans-unit.target: 数组<xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref>表示 Y 值的数据点值。
